Class Machine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Machine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    public class Machine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    The class Machine represents a machine that has an admin key, current date, sequence number, and holds a list of accounts and transactions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Machine()
      This constructor initializes all the attributes of the machine through loading a data file if it exists, and also simulate the days per minute for the application.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String changePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String oldPass, java.lang.String newPass, java.lang.String confirmNewPass)
      This method changes the password of an account if the conditions in the method are met, and also returns a String about the status of the password change operation
      java.lang.String createAccount​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String confirmPass, java.lang.String key)
      This method creates an account if the conditions in the method are met, and also returns a String about the status of the account creation
      void createTransactionDetails​(Recipient r, int parcelIndex, boolean insured, java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
      This method creates a parcel and the transaction information using the parameters, and also add the transaction information to the machine's list of transactions
      java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts()
      This method returns the list of accounts in the machine
      java.lang.String getAdminKey()
      This method returns the administrator key of the machine
      java.time.LocalDate getCurrentDate()
      This method returns the current date simulated in the machine
      boolean[] getParcelOptions​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
      This method returns an array pertaining to the available parcels for the list of items in the parameter
      int getSequenceNumber()
      This method returns the sequence number with regards to the number of parcels sent within the current date
      java.lang.String getStatusOfParcel​(java.lang.String trackingNumber)
      This method returns the status of the parcel through the passed tracking number
      java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
      This method returns the list of transactions in the machine
      boolean isAnyParcelAvailable​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
      This method checks whether the the items fit any parcel size
      boolean isAuthorizeLogin​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method checks if the username and password in the parameter is authorized to login to the machine
      boolean isItemFit​(Item item, int[] parcelSize)
      This method checks whether the item is able to fit to the parcel size in the parameter
      void loadData()
      This method loads and copies the contents of the machine object in the "machineData.dat" binary file if it is present, otherwise it will initialize the attributes of the machine
      void run()
      This method increments the current date attribute of the machine by 1 day, resets the sequence number of the next parcel to be created, and updates the status of the transactions in the machine
      void saveData()
      This method creates a binary file "machineData.dat" containing the current state of the the machine object
      void setAdminKey​(java.lang.String key)
      This method sets the administrator key attribute of the machine to the String parameter key
      void shutdown()
      This method terminates the machine operation
      void simulateDayPerMinute()
      This method calls a function that performs the incrementing of the current date and the updating of parcel statuses every minute (in real time)
      java.lang.String trackParcel​(java.lang.String trackingNumber)
      This method returns the information of the parcel through the passed tracking number

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Machine

        public Machine()
        This constructor initializes all the attributes of the machine through loading a data file if it exists, and also simulate the days per minute for the application.

    • Method Detail

      • createTransactionDetails

        public void createTransactionDetails​(Recipient r,
                                     int parcelIndex,
                                     boolean insured,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
        This method creates a parcel and the transaction information using the parameters, and also add the transaction information to the machine's list of transactions
        Parameters:
        r - the recipient of the parcel
        parcelIndex - the index referring to the parcel type and size
        insured - whether the parcel is insured or not insured
        items - the list of items to be inserted in the parcel

      • trackParcel

        public java.lang.String trackParcel​(java.lang.String trackingNumber)
        This method returns the information of the parcel through the passed tracking number
        Parameters:
        trackingNumber - the tracking number of the transaction
        Returns:
        a String containing the tracking information

      • getStatusOfParcel

        public java.lang.String getStatusOfParcel​(java.lang.String trackingNumber)
        This method returns the status of the parcel through the passed tracking number
        Parameters:
        trackingNumber - the tracking number of the transaction
        Returns:
        status of the parcel

      • getParcelOptions

        public boolean[] getParcelOptions​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
        This method returns an array pertaining to the available parcels for the list of items in the parameter
        Parameters:
        items - the list of items
        Returns:
        boolean array of available parcels

      • isItemFit

        public boolean isItemFit​(Item item,
                         int[] parcelSize)
        This method checks whether the item is able to fit to the parcel size in the parameter
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        parcelSize - the parcel size or type
        Returns:
        true if the item fits the parcel size

      • isAnyParcelAvailable

        public boolean isAnyParcelAvailable​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
        This method checks whether the the items fit any parcel size
        Parameters:
        items - the list of items
        Returns:
        true if the items fits any parcel size

      • createAccount

        public java.lang.String createAccount​(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String confirmPass,
                                      java.lang.String key)
        This method creates an account if the conditions in the method are met, and also returns a String about the status of the account creation
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the account
        password - the password of the account
        confirmPass - same as the password of the account
        key - the admin key of the machine
        Returns:
        a String about the account creation status

      • changePassword

        public java.lang.String changePassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String oldPass,
                                       java.lang.String newPass,
                                       java.lang.String confirmNewPass)
        This method changes the password of an account if the conditions in the method are met, and also returns a String about the status of the password change operation
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the account
        oldPass - the old password of the account
        newPass - the new password of the account
        confirmNewPass - same as the new password of the account
        Returns:
        a String of the status of the change password operation

      • isAuthorizeLogin

        public boolean isAuthorizeLogin​(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        This method checks if the username and password in the parameter is authorized to login to the machine
        Parameters:
        username - the username of an account
        password - the password of an account
        Returns:
        true if the username and password matches an account in the list of accounts in the machine

      • saveData

        public void saveData()
        This method creates a binary file "machineData.dat" containing the current state of the the machine object

      • loadData

        public void loadData()
        This method loads and copies the contents of the machine object in the "machineData.dat" binary file if it is present, otherwise it will initialize the attributes of the machine

      • simulateDayPerMinute

        public void simulateDayPerMinute()
        This method calls a function that performs the incrementing of the current date and the updating of parcel statuses every minute (in real time)

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts()
        This method returns the list of accounts in the machine
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Account

      • getTransactions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
        This method returns the list of transactions in the machine
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Transaction

      • getSequenceNumber

        public int getSequenceNumber()
        This method returns the sequence number with regards to the number of parcels sent within the current date
        Returns:
        sequence number of the next parcel to be created in the current date

      • getCurrentDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getCurrentDate()
        This method returns the current date simulated in the machine
        Returns:
        current date (simulated)

      • getAdminKey

        public java.lang.String getAdminKey()
        This method returns the administrator key of the machine
        Returns:
        a String representation of the administrator key

      • setAdminKey

        public void setAdminKey​(java.lang.String key)
        This method sets the administrator key attribute of the machine to the String parameter key
        Parameters:
        key - a String representation of the administrator key

      • run

        public void run()
        This method increments the current date attribute of the machine by 1 day, resets the sequence number of the next parcel to be created, and updates the status of the transactions in the machine
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method terminates the machine operation
